>
[Major Lesson](/Feats.aspx?ID=5010) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 189 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your patron grants you even greater secrets. Choose a major, greater, or basic lesson from the list [here](Lessons.aspx). You gain its associated hex, and your familiar learns the associated spell.

**Special** You can select this feat a second time if you’re 14th level or higher, and a third time if you’re 18th level or higher. Choose a different lesson each time.
name: Major Lesson
